snippet: City officials said it was premature to estimate whether the flooding from Hurricane Sandy could affect the seemingly star-crossed bike-share program’s start date.
abstract: New York officials say it is too soon to know what effect Hurricane Sandy had on city's already-delayed bike-share program; Alta Bike Share equipment, including bicycles and electronic docking stations, were stored in Brooklyn Navy Yard, where storm dumped several feet of water; program is scheduled to start in March 2013.
lead_paragraph: City officials said it was premature to estimate whether the flooding from Hurricane Sandy could affect the seemingly star-crossed bike-share program’s start date.

headline.seo: Bike-Share Equipment Apparently Damaged by Flooding
headline.main: Flooding Apparently Damaged Equipment for Bike-Share Program
headline.print_headline: Flooding Apparently Damaged Equipment for Bike-Share Program
